name: The Big Bug (Chapter 1 Demo)
description:
Story

A man name fred discover something that he haven't seen before, while he does normal things on the daily basis, strange things happening at night as the news reported about a bug type of creature lurks around at people’s home, who knows when or where this creature exist but, it haves a target to mess up someones lives..and that is you.

This is a demo version for the game to see if people will be interest for upcoming chapters for this game 

Instructions

WASD - move

E - Interact

Q - Drop

Right Click - Place Items

F - flashlight
